page.title: VibeThink Orchestrator Mocks
page.description: All available mocks from VibeThink Orchestrator. These dashboards are adapted to the VibeThink style and ready to be promoted to real modules in the /dashboard section.

crm.name: CRM
crm.description: Customer relationship management - VibeThink adapted version ready for production

sales.name: Sales
sales.description: Sales dashboard - VibeThink adapted version ready for production

ecommerce.name: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: E-commerce dashboard - VibeThink adapted version ready for production

finance.name: Finance
finance.description: Financial dashboard with budgets, expenses, and financial planning

projectManagement.name: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Project management with tasks, timelines, and team collaboration

tasks.name: Tasks
tasks.description: Task management with to-do lists, priorities, and deadlines

calendar.name: Calendar
calendar.description: Calendar application with events, scheduling, and reminders

mail.name: Mail
mail.description: Email client with inbox, compose, and email management

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Note-taking application with rich text editing and organization

fileManager.name: File Manager
fileManager.description: File storage and management system with upload, organization, and sharing

websiteAnalytics.name: Website Analytics
websiteAnalytics.description: Website analytics dashboard with traffic data, user interactions, and performance metrics

aiChat.name: AI Chat
aiChat.description: AI-powered chat interface with multiple model support and conversation history

posSystem.name: POS System
posSystem.description: Point of sale system for retail and restaurant management

crypto.name: Crypto
crypto.description: Cryptocurrency portfolio tracker with trading, DeFi, and NFT management
